TitleEnglish: Ghost in the Shell: SAC_2045 - Sustainable War
SummaryEnglish: In the year 2045, after an economic disaster known as the Synchronized Global Default, rapid developments in AI propelled the world to enter a state of "Sustainable War". However, the public is not aware of the threat that AI has towards the human race.
